You can now see the first paperless journeys on DubaiNow using your UAE Pass credentials.
You can now change car ownership through the Drive a Vehicle Journey.
And rent a new apartment and sort out your connections with the Move to a New Home Journe

We have added new functionalities to your profile:
- You can now sync your DubaiNow profile with UAE PASS if you login with UAE PASS.
- You can change the language of the communications you receive from us.
- You can also deactivate your account,

- You can now sync your DubaiNow profile with UAE PASS if you login with UAE PASS.
- You can change the language of the communications you receive from us.
- You can also deactivate your account,

We have done some miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.
